title: C-Shaped ortho-benzodipyrrole Based Acceptors with Different Electronic Effect of Top Substituents for As-Cast Green-Solvent Processed High-Performance Organic Solar Cells

The milestone achievement of organic solar cells (OSCs) in recent years relies on the rapid development of A-DA’D-A type small molecule acceptors (SMAs) with the C-shaped molecular geometry. Recently, the...
